articles.content: Al-Nassr were eliminated from the Saudi Super Cup after losing to Al-Ittihad 3-1. Romarinho had given Al-Ittihad the lead after just 15 minutes. Cristiano Ronaldo had a clear shot at goal in the firs… [+2202 chars]

articles.author: ICC
articles.title: A legend returns: West Indies great re-joins international setup in mentoring role - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The West Indies have received a massive boost with news that former skipper and Caribbean legend Brian Lara will return to the fold in a new role as performance mentor across all international teams.
articles.content: The West Indies have received a massive boost with news that former skipper and Caribbean legend Brian Lara will return to the fold in a new role as performance mentor across all international teams.… [+2093 chars]

articles.title: Porsche's devastating charge is an ominous warning to its rivals - The Race
articles.description: Porsche's Formula E rivals will be worried after Pascal Wehrlein and Jake Dennis locked out the top two places for the second round running.
articles.content:
Porsches devastating pace and efficiency in the hands of Diriyah E-Prix winner Pascal Wehrlein and Avalanche Andrettis Jake Dennis will send a few shockwaves through the Formula E paddock.

articles.title: Man left with swollen and disfigured face after brutal 30-minute slapping contest - The Mirror
articles.description: WARNING: GRAPHIC IMAGES Footage of a brutal slapping contest in Romania has gone viral after one of the competitor's faces was left swollen and disfigured in distressing scenes
articles.content:
